# Example of ANSI Colored Logs

This document demonstrates how to include ANSI colored logs in a Quarto document.

```{python}
import colorama
from colorama import Fore, Style

colorama.init()

def print_colored_logs():
    print(Fore.RED + "This is an error message" + Style.RESET_ALL)
    print(Fore.GREEN + "This is a success message" + Style.RESET_ALL)
    print(Fore.YELLOW + "This is a warning message" + Style.RESET_ALL)
    print(Fore.BLUE + "This is an info message" + Style.RESET_ALL)

print_colored_logs()
